answers.answer: There's a great book I picked up on multiples (I'm not having twins but I love learning about birth). It's called "The Everything Twins, Triplets, and More Book", by Pamela Fierro. It has a ton of information on how multiple pregnancies differ from singletons (like getting tested for gestational diabetes earlier) and even how to deal with having two babies at once (from nursing to sleeping and more). I bet you could find it on Amazon.
Ps I'm also twenty one and will have two kids. :) mine will be spaced not quite two years apart though rather than a few minutes!
I'm also 21 first pregnancy and having identical twins :) I was so scared at first but now I just can't wait it still feels a bit unreal.
I have identical twin boys age 7 it's so much fun

I was 17years old ,  when i had my twin girls when i found out i was veryy scared ,  even got depressed thinking it was going to be the hardest thing in the world people kwpt saying it was going to be hard for me  and its not ,  when  i had my twins everything fell into place i had the engery loved every single moment and untill this day i do and they are seven years old ;) get a routine,  get them use to it and everything will be fine . Goodluck and congrats
I'm soo jealous I wish I had twins :) best of luck to you ladies  god bless those lil munchkins.
Thank you guys. I am getting more and more excited as days go by.

Congrats:) dont stress too much, every pregnancy is difficult carrying twins or just a singleton. I have a 4yr old and im 32weeks pregnant with identical twin boys. Yes it will be hard but so worth it!

question: I'm 21 years old and this is my first pregnancy but just found out that there are 2 little bundles of joy inside me. I'm kind of scared. It's already scary being a first time mother but I am really worried about having two. Does anyone have any tips, techniques, words of wisdom that you can share to ease my nerves a bit?
title: 1st pregnancy and it's twins
